name: DmC: Devil May Cry
summary: DmC: Devil May Cry is the fifth game in the hack-and-slash third-person action series and the first not largely developed by Capcom. This title is a reimagining of the series, with the same protagonist Dante, but set in an alternate universe. The Dante in this game is very different from before, doing away with the trademark white hair and altering the main character as well as the game's tone with a much more Western influence. The gameplay is still largely identical as Dante engages many opponents with a fast fighting style, stringing together combos and hits in quick succession.

name: DmC: Devil May Cry - Definitive Edition
summary: DmC: Devil May Cry - Definitive Edition includes all the stylish action gameplay from the original release, all previously released downloadable content, including the Vergil's Downfall campaign plus brand new modes and additional content, making this the ultimate offering for Devil May Cry fans. Maximizing the potential of next-gen hardware, the game's high quality production values will run at a stunning 1080p and smooth 60 fps across PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.

name: DmC: Devil May Cry - Vergil's Downfall
summary:
Aside from playing as Vergil throughout the content, Vergil's Downfall features additional hidden items to collect, two new enemies and a new boss, and has a leaderboard with which to compete with others. The content also comes with four difficulty levels, new combos, and new locations.

Vergil uses many of his traditional skills, including several based on Slash Dimension, Air Trick, and Summoned Swords, and is able to use Devil Trigger to generate a doppelganger.

name: DMZ: North Korea
summary: DMZ: North Korea

name: DMD Mars Mission
summary: The Martian mining facility FK16 has been invaded by insects and mutated creatures and now the system reports that all human workers have been killed. It's up to you and your assistant Isabel to save the situation. Find and destroy the plague and the queen that controls them before it is too late to save what is left of the new mineral found on Mars and that is vital for the survival of humanity.

name: DMT
summary: DMT is a mind-bending 3D visualization of vast 4-dimensional objects driven by your music!

name: DMCA's Sky
summary: Help Spaceman Finn search for Princess Mango in an infinite universe (that may contain no Mangoes). Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 36.

name: D.M.T
summary:
DMT is an audio-visual game experience - Produced by Arkangel Audio 
 
The team behind DMT supports the fight of the Black Lives Matter movement.

name: DMX Presents: Unnecessary Hypeman Hero
summary: A small, humorous rhythm game featuring DMX.

name: DMN7
summary: Don't let yourself get killed by the mechanical beast known as DMN7 in this underground, stealth, VR experience.

name: DMG Deals Damage
summary: DMG Deals Damage is a homebrew for Game Boy where the player plays as an animated Game Boy (the development code for it was DMG) beating up other portable devices.

name: DMBX: Mountain Biking
summary: Go fast, show incredible tricks and earn coins - that’s DMBX: Mountain Biking in short words! DMBX: Mountain Biking is a fresh mix of downhill racing and trick challenges featuring 10 amazing & unique bike trails with 30 time-, coin- and score challenges. Earn coins to access faster bikes and clear the score challenges to unlock new characters with more power. Each character has his own style and a unique, special trick in his/her repertoire!

name: DMBX 2.5: Mountain Bike and BMX
summary: DMBX gets to the next round: featuring Mountain Bike and BMX action, brand new Downhill, Slopestyle, Vert Ramp, Dirt-Pipe and Big Air levels, ghost and battle races, new bikes and individual characters from head-to-toe, replay options with video and picture export, completely new animations and physics, easy trick-steering and much more! Did you ever want to drop into a vert ramp with your BMX? Or throw yourself over a big air? Maybe you are just about ready to conquer the steepest downhill ever? DMBX is finally here and it will be the perfect fit! Choose and edit your individual character, find your bike or BMX to go along and let’s do it! Master the local challenges to unlock new tricks, new levels, bikes as well as characters and proof your skills against the very best players on the globe in a battle race. If you are free from giddiness and ready for a new dimension - check out the brand new viewing angle option which can guarantee for an exclusive game experience that is one-of-a-kind! All levels - including the vert ramp and big air - can be played in this “First Person View” mode. In addition you can also change into the First Person View mode during the Replay Mode! So what are you waiting for? Gear up and let`s go!!

name: DMG Express
summary: A lovely trip by train.

name: D.M.D Ping Pong Game
summary: Play ping pong as the talented wrestler/dentist Brit Baker!

name: D.M. Dinwiddie, Physician-in-Training
summary:
Developed by Health Media Lab with grants from the National Institutes of Health, D.M. DINWIDDIE, PHYSICIAN-IN-TRAINING teaches children to identify and treat 12 common medical conditions: burns, choking, insect bites and stings, bumps and bruises, cuts and bleeding, sunburn, sprains and broken bones, food poisoning, common cold, influenza, tonsillitis, and appendicitis. Kids play as D.M. Dinwiddie, a 12-year old girl or boy (player's choice) who is earning a Medical Arts Achievement Badge. Through a series of interactive adventures, D.M. finds injured characters in her virtual neighborhood, including her little brother who has an insect bite.

By looking at and talking with the injured characters, and then using a special MedLab (an onscreen database that serves as a reference and diagnostic guide) and her first-aid kit, D.M. is able to diagnose and treat the hurt people.

name: D&M: Dungeon and Monsters the Beginning
summary: Dungeons and Monsters The Beginning is a dungeon crawler exploration game where you must face dozens of different monsters to find the truth and make it to the exit alive!

name: DMBX 2: Mountain Bike and BMX
summary: The game is featuring Mountain Bike and BMX action... completely new levels and characters... new and more bikes... completely new physics... easy trick-steering and much more! Start your virtual biking season right now and try DMBX 2 for FREE !

name: D&M: Spark of Fate
summary: D&M (Dungeon and Monsters): Spark of Fate is a dungeon crawler game that takes place in a dark monster-infested labyrinth. Your goal is to escape from this vile place where you were imprisoned and find your way out using the few resources you find along the way.

name: DMVR
summary: I taught myself how to drive by making this game.

name: DMZ
summary: DMZ is a VR content that allows you to explore the area around the DMZ in Yeoncheon. Accompanied by a soldier, you can learn about the history and natural ecosystems of the DMZ area. You can also experience landmine removal through minigames.

name: Dmod
summary: Dmod is fan mademobile port of GMod

name: DMB
summary: ДМБ is an adventure game developed by Студия "Парус". It was originally released in 2004.

name: DMB 2
summary:
DMB 2 is an adventure game and a sequel to the original DMB. The game takes place some time after the first game. Alex Chaikin has finished his service in the army and came back home with the girl he met there. They got married and had 2 kids. But Alex, being a lazy guy, didn't look for work and lived off the money he got carrying out a special mission in the army. Soon afterwards, the young couple ran out of money and Kate, his wife, sent him off to find a job.

It didn't take too long to find a job as Alex received a phone call from his friend asking him to join the ranks of the Police. Thus, getting his first job to investigate a burglary, players will begin the adventure game.

Being a point and click adventure game, players will need to find, pick up and use various objects in different situations. Alex also has access to a police database, where he can find out extra info about the important characters in the game.

name: DMT Simulator
summary: ascend the tunnel encounter entities will you portal home or stay trapped in eternity?

name: DMZ: Nuclear Survival
summary: DMZ: Nuclear Survival is a multiplayer open-world survival crafting game set in a post-apocalyptic world after nuclear war. Build a private military company, train survivors as soldiers, explore a vast procedurally generated map, uncover relics from ancient ruins, and fight for survival.
